resources.string: This demo application shows the main features of the experimental Android Bluetooth library. Have fun!
This activity shows basic interaction with LocalBluetoothDevice: you can enable or disable the phone's Bluetooth service. (look at the small Bluetooth icon in the notification area on top of display)
This activity shows some information about local bluetooth stack: address, friendly name...
Bluetooth is not enabled: go back to the main menu and enable Bluetooth stack using the first application sample
Sorry: Arduino Bluetooth sample application is still not ready. It will be available in next release
This activity shows you discovery capability of the Bluetooth stack. Select "Scan" from the system menu to proceed...

This activity demonstrates the RFCOMM feature trying to connect to a Bluetooth GPS (if you have one available). Select "Scan" from the system menu to find Bluetooth devices. Select the GPS device: a dialog will show the NMEA sentences coming from the RFCOMM connection
This application demonstrates the features of the Experimental Android Bluetooth Library. Check it out at: \n\n http://code.google.com/p/android-bluetooth
